mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (member_no, cate_no, title, info, price, img1, deli_price, stock, min_count, max_count, state, id, reg_date, upt_date, sort) VALUES (#{member_no}, #{cate_no}, #{title}, #{info}, #{price}, #{img1}, #{deli_price}, #{stock}, #{min_count}, #{max_count}, ‘Y’, #{id}, now(), now(), #{sort})
